item.title: CAFA PI Data Exploration
item.description: The Challenge This semester, Iâ€™ve been working with the BYU Bioinformatics Research Group on the CAFA PI challenge. The goal of CAFA PI is to predict which proteins perform some specific functions. The first major roadblock: no training data was provided. So we divided into three groups: Data acquisition (we needed to get our hands on some training data), Data transformation (said training data needed to be formatted), and Data analytics.
